newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: Australian stocks seen holding narrow range.
newsitem.headline: Australian stocks seen holding narrow range.

text.p: SPI Sycom cl 2623.0 unch US 30yr cl 6.92 -0.06
*Stocks expected to trade narrow range with little news
offshore. "The market could struggle a bit for direction but the
underlying strength is still there," said a Brisbane broker.
*U.S. blue chip stocks closed nearly unchanged after erasing a sharp decline, triggered by a profit warning from Intel Corp.
*ADRs:News Corp NWS.N 17-3/4 (+1/8), BHP 28-7/8 (+1/4), WMC 26 (+1/4), National Australia Bank 71-1/2 (+3/8)
*Gold price eased, copper prices backed off one year highs on end-of-week book squaring and nickel slid to lowest level in six weeks as fears of Canadian strike lifted.
